item.title: CVE-2024-31429|2024-04-15T09:32:49.523Z -- Blossom Themes -- Sarada Lite
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Blossom Themes Sarada Lite.This issue affects Sarada Lite: from n/a through 1.1.2.
